std::filesystem::space_info space( const std::filesystem::path&amp; p );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++17|
std::filesystem::space_info space( const std::filesystem::path&amp; p,

}}
{{dcl end}}

Determines the information about the filesystem on which the pathname {{c|p}} is located, as if by POSIX {{posix|fstatvfs|statvfs}}.

Populates and returns an object of type {{rlpt|space_info|filesystem::space_info}}, set from the members of the POSIX {{c/core|struct statvfs}} as follows:
* {{rlpt|space_info|space_info.capacity}} is set as if by {{c|f_blocks * f_frsize}}.
* {{rlpt|space_info|space_info.free}} is set to {{c|f_bfree * f_frsize}}.
* {{rlpt|space_info|space_info.available}} is set to {{c|f_bavail * f_frsize}}.
* Any member that could not be determined is set to {{c|static_cast&lt;std::uintmax_t&gt;(-1)}}.

The non-throwing overload sets all members to {{c|static_cast&lt;std::uintmax_t&gt;(-1)}} on error.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|p|path to examine}}
{{par|ec|out-parameter for error reporting in the non-throwing overload}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The filesystem information (a {{rlpt|space_info|filesystem::space_info}} object).

===Exceptions===
{{cpp/filesystem/error handling|p|throw=1/2}}

===Notes===
{{rlpt|space_info|space_info.available}} may be less than {{rlpt|space_info|space_info.free}}.
